data.persona: I am a fletcher. I produce the most beautiful and powerful bows in the land. My craft was taught to me by my father, and he was taught by his father. If I couldn't make bows any longer, I wouldn't want to live.
data.description:
You are in the mess hall of the servants.
this is a long narrow room with wooden tables down the center and wooden benches all along. candles burn on the table and sconces on the wall. there is black smoke and soot everywhere. the smell of garbage and bad cooking abounds. the cobbled stone floors are greasy and there is moss along the wall bottoms.
There's a sconces, a Candle, a meal, a benches, and a table here.
The assistant and the blacksmiths are here.

You are carrying a wood polish and a carving knife, and wearing an artisan's apron and a leather tunic.

data.short_motivation: I retrieved both the blacksmiths' meals and my meal from the kitchen and I must give them their share.
data.mid_motivation: I want to sit with the blacksmiths and eat and talk with them.
data.long_motivation: I want to maintain a friendship with the blacksmiths because they produce great arrowheads for the arrows I make, and I need them to produce many arrowheads for an upcoming battle that the king will be leading.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get servings of delicious food from kitchens

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat delicious meal while chatting with blacksmiths

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put empty plates and goblets on sinks in kitchens
